invocations.description: Moves your character in the specified direction. direction can be: 'n', 'e', 's', 'w', 'ne', 'se', 'sw' or 'nw'.
invocations.ex:
auto(100)
if (paround(9) > 0 and not $pzone) then
	move('s') wait(300,500)
end
invocations.exDescription: Checks if there are players on your screen and if you are in a protection zone. If there are players around and you aren't in a protection zone, it will move you to the south.
